title: Tech drops Sunday finale against Texas - Texas Tech Red Raiders - TexasTech.com
content: Tech drops Sunday finale against Texas - Texas Tech Red Raiders  TexasTech.com
description: LUBBOCK, Texas – No. 16 Texas Tech fell 12-1 to No. 2 Texas in the series finale on Sunday at Rip Griffin Park. The contest ended with a run-rule after the seventh inning, soon-after Texas exploded for seven runs in the top half of the seventh. In league play, a 10-run, run-rule, is in effect on Sundays after seven innings are completed.
